title: truckinusa44
author: truckinusa44
content: Is there some type of graphical interface I use to mine with my antminer u2s?Â  Looking for something quick and easy to get them mining.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Have you tried to use the magnifying glass above? To search about the guide how to setup this unit?If not then I found few of them that you can try.This one below is the simple setup guide.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=555638.0Then other guide below using raspi or different OS- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=572769.0- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5388678.0Lets see which one will work. The last link is the newest setup that I found.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: cgminer compiled with --enable-icarus runs them.Though that involves reading the README.
